name: Enterprise ATT&CK Matrix for Enterprise Layer
description: Techniques observed in specified cybersecurity breaches and phishing attempts.

techniques.comment: Mention of "Contact Us" suggests collecting or soliciting emails, possibly as part of initial reconnaissance efforts.
Inferred from "treatment" and "clean", there's a potential implication of data destruction or impact role in disguising attacks such as timber decking systems that ostensibly seem legitimate.
